ValidationRule.description: A Contract Out Clause option must be selected when Appointment Guarantee contains Annual or Appointments.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name <> 'Sapper_CSS', NOT(ISPICKVAL(Pipeline_Appointment_Guarantee__c ,'Dials Only')), ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,'Completed'), ISBLANK(TEXT( Contract_Out_Clause__c )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a Contract Out Clause value when Pipeline Appointment Guarantee includes appointments.
